return to castle wolfenstein is an awesome game that perfectly captures the spirit of retro shooters like doom quake and duke nukem 3d the gameplay is fastpaced the levels are welldesigned and the atmosphere is good blending action with a bit of horror and a unique wwii twist if youre a fan of classic shooters this game is a musttry it holds up really well and offers a lot of fun even years after its release  rating 810 definitely give it a try if you love retro shooters
